title: Authors and Citation
text: Sonnenberg H (2022). kwb.odm: Interface ODM database (see http://.cuahsi.org/odmdatabases.html). R package version 0.2.0, https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.odm.
code: @Manual{,   title = {kwb.odm: Interface to ODM database (see http://his.cuahsi.org/odmdatabases.html)},   author = {Hauke Sonnenberg},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.2.0},   url = {https://github.com/KWB-R/kwb.odm}, }

title:
Interface to ODM database (see
    http://his.cuahsi.org/odmdatabases.html)
text: installing latest release R package run following code :
code: # Enable repository from kwb-r options(repos = c(   kwbr = 'https://kwb-r.r-universe.dev',   CRAN = 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))  # Download and install kwb.odm in R install.packages('kwb.odm')  # Browse the kwb.odm manual pages help(package = 'kwb.odm')
